data.title: Saratoga Springs High School
data.text:
High School News

More School News

graduation

Congratulations to the Saratoga Springs High School Class of 2024! Your hard work, dedication, and perseverance have led you to this remarkable milestone, and we couldn't be prouder!

walkthrough

Before walking the stage next week, graduating seniors visited an elementary school and were greeted with cheers, high-fives, signs, and plenty of smiles. We are so proud of the class of 2024!

giveback day

Students from the Class of 2024 volunteered throughout the community as part of Senior Giveback Day.

nys seal of biliteracy

Congratulations to the 79 seniors who earned the NYS Seal of Biliteracy! This recognition is awarded to graduates who have attained a high proficiency in English and one or more world languages.

pitney

On Earth Day, over 140 Saratoga Springs High School students planted trees at Pitney Meadows Community Farm as part of the Windbreak Planting Project.

national merit

Congratulations to seniors Emma Anthes, Adam Brown, Charles Heck, and Aditi Singh for being named 2024 National Merit Finalists by the National Merit Scholarship Program
